data.message: Hello, I'm just wondering why everyone gets an answer on this page except me.

replies.message: Hi Timeka. If you're experiencing problems with confirmation codes, there are a few things you can try: http://bit.ly/2AOPIKP. If you're still having trouble, please report this problem to us by following these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2iinpgg. -Kiara

Facebook Thanks for your response. I'm getting the codes, but the codes don't work. Security check does not accept any code that is sent to my phone. Either something is wrong with the codes or something is wrong with the Security Check app. Either way, I have no way to regain access to my account. I have reported this problem at least 10 times. I have submitted my drivers license and passport as ID. I have not been able to resolve this at all. Is there anything else I can do?
Iam not getting a reply to my queries either so frustrating
